item.description:
Let's meet at Pepper Sky's Thai Sensation located at:
20 Pearl Street
Cambridge, MA

Pepper Sky's is only a block from the Havana Club.

Havana Club is located at 288 Green Street, Cambridge, MA. There is parking right next door for $1/hr (according to the website).
Visit the following website for directions and VERY reasonable parking.

http://havanaclubsals...

Friday Night Salsa is Boston's salsa hot spot featuring lessons and salsa dancing with warm & welcoming salsa dancers. Friday Night Salsa has it all, including: a 5400 square foot ballroom, a performance stage, club lighting and sound, a full bar, a parking garage next door ($1/hr) and public transport on Mass Ave. (Red Line 'Central' stop, Buses 1, 64 etc.) one block away! Salsa/Rueda lessons 8:30-9:30, Salsa Lessons 9:30-10:30, and Salsa Dance Party from 10:30-2am.
item.name: Salsa - Havana Club
